snippet.title: Subject 9 [Official Release Trailer]
snippet.description:
Subject 9 Is Out Now!!!
Developed by Diffusional Arts

[Official Game Site] http://subject-9.com 
[Official Studio Site] http://diffusional-arts.com 
[Official IndieDB] http://www.indiedb.com/games/subject-9
[Official Greenlight] http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=160484802 

[Facebook Page] http://facebook.com/DiffusionalArts
[Twitter Page] http://twitter.com/SiIentDeveloper

- About The Game - 

Subject 9 is a single player tactical isometric shooter, with a strong emphasis on fun and fluid gameplay.  The game offers a campaign mode that will take you through the story in the eyes of Subject 9 and his stand against VexTech.

- Subject 9 - 

Genre: Shooter, Arcade
Targeted Release Date: August 8th, 2013
Platform: PC
